scripts.start: node -e "if (process.platform !== 'linux') { console.error('\x1b[31mError: This script can only be run on Linux.\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }" && yarn gen && vite --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.gen: yarn download-openapi && yarn generate-api && yarn rename-service
scripts.rename-service: sed -i '$d' src/api/index.ts && echo "export { DefaultService as MauriceApi } from './services/DefaultService';" >> src/api/index.ts
